invocations.description: Sell amount units of item itemname on market. It will always pick the best offer (most expensive item), that costs at least price. If you set createoffer to true it will create an offer for the item at price price if a good offer wasn't found on the current offers list. offeranonymous gives you the option to create an offer anonymously or not (defaults to true).
Allows you to sell an item on market from a specific character name.
